PerfectNetExp.abs: 无论如何,它总可以表明罗马之中,实在有很多犹太乞丐的存在。 乞丐(schnorrer)之在古代犹太教中,已是一宗很可注意的现象了。 自然,这种流氓无产阶级也是一种很不.
schmo 笨人,愚人,傻瓜,无聊的家伙schnorrer 叫化子,过寄生生活者,乞丐shlemiel 倒楣的人,笨手笨脚的人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Yiddish shnorrer, variant of German Schnurrer

list.explanation: 乞丐，(靠乞讨或欺骗)白拿、白吃者

example.en: Buy your own ciggies if you don't like mine. Schnorrers can't be choosers.
example.zh: 你要是不爱抽我的烟，就自己去买你爱抽的。白吃人家的别挑三拣四。

auth_sentence.content: Bolt, who not only acts but writes, directs, and produces, had just opened his latest film, "Requiem for a Schnorrer," to raves.
auth_sentence.res_content: Bolt, who not only acts but writes, directs, and produces, had just opened his latest film, "Requiem for a Schnorrer," to raves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bolt, who not only acts but writes, directs, and produces, had just opened his latest film, "Requiem for a Schnorrer," to raves.
